titleStmt.title: The rending church-member regularly call'd back to Christ and to his church, or, A sober answer to certain questions of a company of discontented and covenant-deserting brethren in which are laid down clear grounds of solid conviction ... / by Marmaduke Matthews ...

notesStmt.note: Preface dated: From my study in Swansey the 12th instant of the 10th moneth, 1658.
Imperfect: pages faded and stained with print showthrough and loss of print. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
